_index.meta-title: Linkat | Create a Link in Bio for Bluesky
_index.meta-description: Linkat is an ATProto service for creating a "Link in Bio" for Bluesky. Your links are saved in your PDS.
_index.hero-text:
Create your Link in Bio
for Bluesky
_index.notes-link: Things to keep in mind when using Linkat

login.oauth-resolve-error-message: Failed to log in (maybe the handle is incorrect)

login-form.login-description: Please enter your Bluesky or Self-hosting PDS account handle.

sample.you-can-write-text-instead-of-url: You can write text instead of a URL

edit.confirm-leave-message: Unsaved changes will be lost. Are you sure?

board-viewer.confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete?

share-modal.title: Saved
share-modal.description: Let's share your Link in Bio!
share-modal.share-text: I created a Link in Bio using Linkat! #linkat {{url}}

card-form.help-input-message: Either the URL or text can be left blank.
card-form.help-emoji-message: When not selected, it will be automatically determined based on the URL.

card-form-provider.input-required-error-message: Please enter one of the fields

bluesky-feed.error-message: Error! Failed to display the feed.

layout.footer-message: Create a Link in Bio with Linkat

error-boundary.image-alt: Image of a dog with a sad expression

logout-button.confirm-message: Are you sure you want to log out?
